articles.title: Hegseth Calls on NATO Allies to Lead Europe's Security, Rules Out Support for Ukraine Membership - Department of Defense
articles.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, while delivering remarks at the 26th iteration of the Ukraine Defense Contact Group in Brussels, called on NATO allied countries to increase their defense spending and
articles.content: Stating that the U.S. does not believe NATO membership for Ukraine would be a "realistic" outcome of any negotiated peace settlement with Russia, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, today, called on NATO… [+3872 chars]
